languages.text: "Однако его бессмертие имеет предел: для возрождения нужны реагенты, оборудование, энергия — этим мастер плоти в избытке располагал в Комморре, но сейчас он в бегах и уязвим. И пока гемункул не восстановил силы, есть шанс уничтожить его навеки".

"But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."
languages.original_text: "Однако его бессмертие имеет предел: для возрождения нужны реагенты, оборудование, энергия — этим мастер плоти в избытке располагал в Комморре, но сейчас он в бегах и уязвим. И пока гемункул не восстановил силы, есть шанс уничтожить его навеки".

traits.locale_text: "But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

"But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

"But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

"But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

"But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

"But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

languages.text: « Mais son immortalité a des limites : le processus de résurrection nécessite des réactifs, de l'équipement et de l'énergie, autant de ressources dont le ciseleur de chair disposait librement à Commorragh, mais plus depuis qu'il est en fuite et vulnérable. Et tant que l'hémoncule n'a pas recouvré toutes ses forces, nous avons une chance de le détruire définitivement. »
languages.original_text: "But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

languages.text: «Pero su inmortalidad tiene límites: la resurrección requiere ciertos reactivos, equipo, energía... En Commorragh, el señor de la carne tenía de todo en abundancia, pero ahora está a la fuga y es vulnerable. Si todavía no ha recuperado todo su poder, es la oportunidad perfecta de acabar con el Hemónculo de una vez por todas».
languages.original_text: "But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

languages.text: 「だが、彼の不死性にも限界がある。復活には試薬や設備、エネルギーが必要だからな。肉持つ主はそれをコモラフではたっぷりと備えていたが、今や逃走中であり弱っている。ハモンキュラスはまだ完全な力を取り戻していない今こそ、奴を完全に滅ぼすいい機会なのだ」
languages.original_text: "But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、彼の不死性にも限界がある。復活には試薬や設備、エネルギーが必要だからな。肉持つ主はそれをコモラフではたっぷりと備えていたが、今や逃走中であり弱っている。ハモンキュラスはまだ完全な力を取り戻していない今こそ、奴を完全に滅ぼすいい機会なのだ」

languages.text: “不过，他的永生不朽是有限制的。复活身躯需要试剂、设备、能量。若是在科摩罗，血肉之主确实拥有大量资源，但他现在亡命在外，非常脆弱。血伶人还没有完全恢复力量，我们有机会把他彻底消灭。”
languages.original_text: "But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

languages.text: "Aber seine Unsterblichkeit hat eine Grenze: die Wiederbelebung erfordert Reagenzien, Ausrüstung, Energie ... all das hatte der Fleischmeister in Commorragh im Überfluss, aber mittlerweile ist er auf der Flucht und verwundbar. Und solange der Haemonculus nicht seine ganze Stärke zurückerlangt hat, besteht eine Chance, ihn für immer zu vernichten."
languages.original_text: "But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."

languages.text: "Fakat ölümsüzlüğünün de sınırı var. Dirilmesi için ayıraçlar, ekipmanlar ve enerji gerek. Etseçer, Commorragh'tayken bunlara ziyadesiyle sahipti ancak şimdi firarda ve saldırıya açık. Ayrıca henüz tüm kuvvetini toplayamamışken Haimonkulus'u ebediyen yok etme ihtimali mevcut."
languages.original_text: "But his immortality has a limit: resurrection requires reagents, equipment, energy — the fleshmaster had those in abundance in Commorragh, but now he is on the run and vulnerable. And while the Haemonculus has not yet returned to full strength, there is a chance to destroy him forever."
